text: The Famous Paparazzo () is a 1999 Romanian action drama movie directed by Nicolae Mărgineanu and starring Marcel Iureș, Maria Ploae, Gheorghe Dinică, Draga Olteanu Matei, Alexandru Repan, Gheorghe Visu, Vlad Ivanov, George Alexandru, Valentin Teodosiu. ==Other websites== * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1999 action movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Romanian action movies Category:Movies directed by Nicolae Mărgineanu
title: The Famous Paparazzo
